{?hero_names}%s set off to reclaim Holy Relics buried deep in the ruined vaults of the ancestral home. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s embarked in search of vital medicines lost along the Old Road in the Weald. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s went to recover foodstuffs that the Swine have stolen and stashed in the Warrens. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s went to reclaim some of the Ancestor's most prized relics. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
{?hero_names}%s went on a mission of reclamation in the Ruins, to restore holy altars in the name of Light. ({?difficulty}%s {?length}%s)
